game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, the protagonist discovers they are the last hope for humanity's survival. A cataclysmic event known as 'The Great Forgetting' is causing people to lose their memories and identities, erasing entire cultures and histories. The player must navigate a surreal landscape of fragmented recollections, piecing together clues to uncover the truth behind the impending doom.
game.beginning: The game begins with the protagonist waking up in a desolate, dreamlike world with no recollection of who they are or how they got there. They soon discover that they possess a rare gift - the ability to absorb and relive memories from others. Guided by an enigmatic figure known only as 'The Architect', the player embarks on a perilous journey to explore the realm of lost memories.
game.ending: As the protagonist unravels the mystery behind The Great Forgetting, they must confront the true source of the calamity: a powerful entity born from humanity's collective unconscious. In a climactic showdown, the player must harness the power of their own memories and those of others to defeat the entity and restore balance to the world. Success will revive the lost cultures and histories, but at what cost? The ending leaves the player questioning the nature of identity, memory, and the consequences of playing with fire in the realm of human experience.
